text: (kya unhen samajh nahin) ya unake kuchh aise (thaharae hue) saajheedaar hai, jinhonn unake lie koee aisa dharm nirdhaarit kar diya hai jisakee anugya allaah ne nahin dee? yadi faisale kee baat nishchit na ho gaee hotee to unake beech faisala ho chuka hota. nishchay hee zaalimon ke lie dukhad yaatana hai
